feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Make new tables require ADMIN permissions to read and write. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14709
  • Fix SQL removing related row from many side by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14749
  • Only check visible fields when checking group by view calculations. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14753
  • Feature flag default roles to admin by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14754
  • Test calculation view searching. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14750
  • Fix table updates wiping out view calculation fields. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14756
  • Prevent deleting rows through a calculation view. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14748
  • Properly clean up row actions on table deletion. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14758
  • Fix for an issue found with custom role naming by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14762

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.32.15...2.32.16

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.32.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • UI tweak for days remaining banner of free trial by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14764
  • View joins - allow related required columns' visibility to be changed by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14759
  • Update pro by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14769
  • Remove related fields popover by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14761

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.32.16...2.32.17

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.33.0
entry.content:
üõë For self-hosters making use of the Budibase docker-compose setup, this release may require an update to your docker-compose file, including updating to a new version of CouchDB, documentation can be found here: https://docs.budibase.com/docs/migrations#budibase-db-sql-support ‚ö†Ô∏èthis release of Budibase will trigger a migration process for each app when first accessed. This is to move to a new search subsystem for any internal tables. Apps will be inaccessible during the migration, and we expect the migration to take a few minutes (longer if you have a lot of rows in your internal tables, e.g. tens of thousands).

What's Changed

  • Extend available labels for feature branch deployments by @calexiou in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14773
  • Fix all or property by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14774
  • Allow sorting by calculation fields. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14763
  • Allow BB_REFERNCE_SINGLE to have default values. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14772
  • Fix searching by bindings when those bindings have been stored in the view.query field. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14775
  • Fixing issue with base permissions of tables by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14779
  • Add on click events for grid layout containers by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14768
  • Support default values on multi-user columns. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14789
  • Fixing inconsistent column schemas by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14791
  • View joins with any and all not working correctly by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14770
  • Release SQS for self-host users (single image, docker compose, Kubernetes) by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/13999
  • Move conditionals to env section by @calexiou in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14788
  • Write Redis data to the persistent data dir in single image. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14797

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.32.17...2.33.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.33.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Ensure external tables always have a sourceId. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14807

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.33.0...2.33.1

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.33.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix multiple relationships same table by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14798
  • Fix negated join filters on relationships by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14795

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.33.1...2.33.2
